title: Quick Refried Beans
directions: n a skillet over medium heat, cook 1 smashed and minced clove of garlic in about 1 tablespoon of canola oil until lightly browned. Add 1 can (15 ounces) of undrained pinto beans or black beans, 1/2 teaspoon of ground cumin, 1 teaspoon of chili powder, and salt, to taste. Heat for about 4 to 5 minutes. Mash the beans and stir in 1 tablespoon of lime juice if desired.
ingredients: Quick Refried Beans - In a skillet over medium heat, cook 1 smashed and minced clove of garlic in about 1 tablespoon of canola oil until lightly browned. Add 1 can (15 ounces) of undrained pinto beans or black beans, 1/2 teaspoon of ground cumin, 1 teaspoon of chili powder, and salt, to taste. Heat for about 4 to 5 minutes. Mash the beans and stir in 1 tablespoon of lime juice if desired.
